mapper.select: select a.orders_no, a.no, a.recipient, a.re_zipcode, a.re_address, a.re_address_detail, a.re_hp, a.sum_price, a.payment_method, a.orders_regdate, a.orders_qty, b.* from (select o1.*,o2.book_no, o2.orders_qty, o2.orders_state from orders o1 join orders_detail o2 on o2.orders_no = o1.orders_no where o1.orders_no = ${ordersNo} )a join book b on a.book_no = b.book_no
